0.title: we are...
0.message: Your guide to shopping sustainably. Scan your products, get data on their environmental impact and compete for Eat.It points!

1.title: smart choices
1.message: You have the power to make an impact. Right here and right now. If you think about your choices and take the right decisions, our future will be in good hands.

2.title: compete
2.message: We want you to be a sustainability leader. Gain as many Eat.It points as possible and offline rewards for your smart choices.

delete-user-alert.text: Are you sure you want to delete your account?

error.title: New product
error.message: You have found a new product! No data is available on it yet.

scanner.average-impact-message: The average impact of products in the same category is

empty.text: Empty basket - please scan some products to get points!

marketPlaceholder.text: The first sustainable marketplace is opening soon! Use earned points for discounts!

error.title: Update error
error.message: Profile update failed, try again later

welcome.title: welcome!
welcome.subtitle: Login or create a new account

invalid-login.title: INVALID EMAIL ID OR USERNAME
invalid-login.message: The format of your E-mail or Username is incorrect

invalid-password.title: Invalid password
invalid-password.message: The password must be between 6 and 50 characters long and can contain only Latin letters, numbers and special characters

bad-login.title: INCORRECT PASSWORD
bad-login.message: Your password is incorrect, please sign in or restore your password above

invalid-email.title: Invalid email
invalid-email.message: The format of your E-mail is incorrect

invalid-username.title: Invalid username
invalid-username.message: The username must be between 1 and 50 characters long and can contain only Latin letters, numbers, “-” and “_”

invalid-password.title: Invalid password
invalid-password.message: The password must be between 6 and 50 characters long and can contain only Latin letters, numbers and special characters

password-mismatch.title: PASSWORDS DON’T MATCH
password-mismatch.message: Please make sure that both passwords are the same in the form above

invalid-agree.title: TERMS OF SERVICE
invalid-agree.message: Please accept the terms of service above to continue using the app

signup-confirmation.title: enter code
signup-confirmation.subtitle: Please enter the code that you received by email.

mismatch.title: THE CODE DOESN’T MATCH
mismatch.message: Please make sure that the code matches the email code

invalid-login.message: The format of your E-mail or Username is incorrect

confirmation.title: enter code
confirmation.subtitle: Please enter the code that you received by email.

error.connection-error: Connection to server is lost. Please check if you are connected to the internet
error.server-error: Sorry, our server has an error. We're fixing it. Please try again later.

permissions.title: No permission
permissions.camera: The app doesn't have permission to use the camera. Please give permission in the device settings.
permissions.gallery: The app doesn't have permission to use the gallery. Please give permission in the device settings.
